about: I am an MBA Finance student, with strong foundation in management and problem-solving skills. I have done my Bachelor in Business Management(BMS) in Finance from HR College, Mumbai. I developed leadership and teamwork skills as the Director of Project at Leo Club Kandivali Lokhandwala township, Mumbai, where we worked to make a positive impact in community. I have also been a delegate at Harvard Conference (HPAIR ACONF) 2023 held at Hongkong in August, which gave me an experienece to learn from global leaders and network with them.
